attributes.action: Demand A Full And Independant Investigation Into The Attacks Of 911.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NYFD,the survivors,the witnesses and almost everyone who investigates believes 911 was an inside job. The Twin Towers and WTC7 were brought down by controlled demolition.Those within the US and Isareli govts that planned these attacks should be charged.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
